channel.title: Downloading Cache Failure Rep++
channel.description:
EDIT: Every problem I've had, I've fixed myself. You people never help, so I'll just figure it out again by myself. Let this post die rather than say something of no use...
EDIT AGAIN!!!: I did it! Muhahaha I can now make a downloadable client for PCs and Macs (which means probably Linux too).
Hello, I am trying to run a client, but, on my mac, the cache download fails. I do however have the cache, but don't know how to organize it. Could someone download this: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5kmngewnnmb]http://www.mediafire.com/?5kmngewnnmb[/url] and take a snapshot of the files for me to use as a reference? If my organizing of the files won't fix my problem, but you know how, please PM me how to properly fix it! I would Rep+ you.
Thanks much!
TheCyberMan
P.S. I will rep++ the one who helps first :)
